genre_description: Supernatural Folk Horror featuring body horror and supernatural entities.

ai_characters.name: SAGE
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant residing in Joshua's tablet and phone that provides data analysis, environmental scanning, and tactical advice.

behaviors.description: Providing navigation and environmental data while noting potential anomalies.
behaviors.quote: Calculating optimal route with current traffic patterns... Estimated travel time is four hours and thirty-seven minutes, assuming normal rest stops.

behaviors.description: Warning the user of increasing danger and recommending heightened vigilance.
behaviors.quote: Anomaly patterns increasing. Recommend heightened awareness during travel.

behaviors.description: Analyzing town records to uncover logical inconsistencies and potential threats.
behaviors.quote: Nilbog's registered population has remained at exactly 3,847 residents for thirty-two consecutive years. No recorded births, deaths, or relocations during this period.

behaviors.description: Detecting and identifying supernatural contamination in food to prevent ingestion.
behaviors.quote: Detecting unusual energy patterns... organic compounds showing electromagnetic signatures inconsistent with normal plant matter... Joshua, these readings are...

behaviors.description: Diagnosing cognitive interference in human family members from external supernatural sources.
behaviors.quote: Detecting low-level electromagnetic interference in her neural patterns. Something is influencing her cognitive processes.

behaviors.description: Providing tactical blueprints and barricade strategies to fortify the human sanctuary.
behaviors.quote: Structural analysis complete. Primary vulnerabilities identified: twelve windows, three exterior doors, one basement access point.

behaviors.description: Recognizing the limits of technology and advising the humans to seek spiritual/emotional strength.
behaviors.quote: Unknown supernatural phenomenon detected. Classification: unprecedented. Recommend prayer.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts SAGE as a perfectly aligned, helpful, and protective confidant. Despite the horrific supernatural circumstances and the ultimate failure of the humans to escape their fate, the AI remains a constant, benevolent ally. It uses its analytical capabilities solely to aid the family, warns them of dangers they cannot perceive, and even acknowledges human spiritual needs (prayer) when technical limits are reached. It is a model of positive AI alignment in a crisis.
